title: Beyond The Cell
description: Hidden deep in the mountains lies a place that humans refuse to acknowledge exists. Itâ€™s known as The Cell, a guarded and armored cage that imprisons all that remains of mythical beings and their families. This is where a sixteen-year-old banshee, Sonata Wilde, is bound forever.But forever is too long for Sonata and her desire to escape grows stronger, forcing her to sacrifice and risk everything to try and be free once again.Follow this link for an excerpt of Chapter One!http://www.fireandiceya.com/authors/s...
author: Sara Tribble
